class Solution {
public:
    std::vector<int> grayCode(int n) {
        //Base case is n == 1
        //Return the vector [0,1]
        if(n == 1){
            return {0,1};
        }

        //Generate the grayCode for (n-1)
        std::vector<int> ret = grayCode(n-1);

        //A grayCode can be generated by taking an existing gray code,
        //reversing it, adding a 1 to the front of each element
        //and then appending that to the original grayCode
        //Iterate backward through the list adding a 1 to the front of the element
        //Push that onto the back of ret
        for(long i = ret.size()-1; i >= 0; i--){
            ret.push_back(ret[i]|1<<(n-1));
        }
        
        //Return the generated grayCode
        return ret;
    }
};
